esapi.unifreiburg.util
Class EsapiConstant

java.lang.Object
  esapi.unifreiburg.util.EsapiConstant

public final class EsapiConstant
extends java.lang.Object

EsapiConstant is utility file which keeps variable and associated value. This all variables are used in custom validation at client side. For Example :-
<h:inputText id="creditcard" value="#{user.creditcard}" required="#{true}" label="Credit Card">
<esapi:validation name="CREDITCARD" />
</h:inputText>
In above tag validation name is "CREDITCARD" and it is declared inside this constant file.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Rakesh, Dr.Prof.Emmanuel
